description: This app for Palm webOS contains 193 flashcards covering the world capitals. If you're learning to learn what the capital of each nation is, this is a simple and intuitive tool to do so. We recognize there are other apps out there with similar content, but we think this one has the best interface. This could be useful for you geography bee, civil service exam, or just to enhance your knowledge. Flashcard Features Each flashcard contains a capital city, followed by the matching country in a reinforcing sentence, making this an ideal on-the-go test prep app for your geography class or these valuable exams. Our flashcard app has simple, intuitive navigation, with features including Shuffle, Reset, Remove Flashcard from Deck. About Upward Mobility Upward Mobility was formed to create high quality management education and test preparation material that is witty, engaging and adds value in the learning process. One of our goals is to make niche learning tools so that people have quality, on-the-go tools to learn whatever they want whenever they want. We hire only expert writers who have strong knowledge in the subject matter and put all of our materials through a thorough review process. We deploy our content through mediums such as mobile applications and other interactive channels.
